fields.name: minimumPreamblesMasterSlave
fields.description: Minimum number of Preambles required for the request message from the Master to the Slave. This number includes the two preambles used in asynchronous Physical Layers  to detect the start of message.
fields.notes: along with the Delimiter

fields.name: hartProtocolMajorRevision
fields.description: HART Protocol Major Revision number implemented by this device. For HART Revision 7, this value must be the number 7.

fields.name: deviceRevisionLevel
fields.notes: refer to the Command Summary Specification

fields.name: softwareRevisionLevel
fields.description: Software Revision Level of this device. Levels 254 and 255 are reserved.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: Device ID. This number must be different for every device manufactured with a given Device Type.

fields.name: numberPreamblesSlaveMaster
fields.description: Number of preambles to be sent with the response message from the Slave to the Master.

fields.name: lastDeviceVariableThis
fields.description: Last Device Variable code. This indicates the last Device Variable code that a host application should expect to be found in the field device . This count does not include the standard devices variables .
fields.notes: e.g., when identifying the Device Variables using Command 54,See Common Table 34
